documentation.text: @notice Number of decimals for returned prices
@notice Underlying Chainlink price feed where prices are fetched from
@notice Whether or not the price should be upscaled
@notice The amount to upscale or downscale the price by

params.decimals_: The number of decimals for the returned prices*
params.underlyingPriceFeed_: The address of the underlying price feed to fetch prices from

returns.answer: Latest price for the asset in terms of ETH
returns.answeredInRound: Round id in which the answer was computed; passed on from underlying price feed*
returns.roundId: Round id from the underlying price feed
returns.startedAt: Timestamp when the round was started; passed on from underlying price feed
returns.updatedAt: Timestamp when the round was last updated; passed on from underlying price feed

constructor.notice: Construct a new scaling price feed

decimals().notice: Number of decimals for returned prices

underlyingPriceFeed().notice: Underlying Chainlink price feed where prices are fetched from

userdoc.notice: A custom price feed that scales up or down the price received from an underlying Chainlink price feed and returns the result
